posts.title: Losing my job.
posts.content:
Not much to say. It was a dream job doing something I enjoy enough that I didn't mind the pay cut for what I'd normally be worth. It was completely out of my hands however. Bad management in the hands of a single person given too much power ran the company into the ground. Biden's economy certainly didn't help, but we could have likely weathered the storm had better decisions been made by someone who actually gave a damn about the company's future.

It's pretty heartbreaking to say the least and it's kept me up at night for the past week. The job meant a lot of things to me. Been praying a lot and giving thanks to God for the opportunity to make great friends and do something I love, but it still hurts like hell to see a lot of good people and time dedicated to our business go down like this. Gonna take a couple months off to focus on the home and family I've been neglecting, and see what new doors open for me as this one shuts. Who knows? Maybe look at going into the same business but for myself this time.

Anyway, not really looking for sympathy, just stressed out and needed to vent a little. Hope you guys are having a good one, take care.

posts.author: NeutronDon1

quotedTweet.content:
Who funded this attack on “Christ is King”? 
Answer: the NCRI was founded in 2018 by Joel Finkelstein. Joel is the son of a rabbi who grew up in Tyler, Texas. He is a psychologist and a neuroscientist who wanted to research social media hate and “identity politics”.

twitter.content:
Finkelstein’s organization, the National Contagion Research Institute, specializes in “extremist-monitoring.” Their affiliations include the UN, the ADL and the Open Society Foundations. 

Yes, that’s right. Jordan Peterson and Daily Wire are now partnering with George Soros’…

posts.title: Is Biden even still alive. There are clips of Joe Rogan saying after he got Covid that he looked different. No public appearances since he lost election.
posts.content:
Now there is news that an auto pen was used by his staff when his signature is needed. There is no way he signed his resignation letter. Why wouldn't he come out in public and strongly say he did sign everything. Why has he been MIA since the election loss. At least vodka drinker Harris showed up at an AI forum.

I remember back when they say he had Covid, reports of him being rushed to a hospital in Las Vegas. Then when he reappeared he seemed to have a spring in his step, he longer had trouble getting up the stairs of Air Force One. Joe Rogan said that he looked different, was taller.

https://www.youtube.com/shorts/kUL1cDxXKV0

https://www.youtube.com/shorts/Eqd5bN9Lg2k

https://www.youtube.com/shorts/vC1jEImQwkk

Also, didn't Biden have a fake Oval Office and a fake tiny desk? None of this adds up. I am convinced at some point during his term, Biden became very ill / incapacated maybe during the election campaign and they had to bring in someone to replace him.

I heard rumors that it was Jim Carey. He is very tall, which would explain why Rogan said he was taller, and i believe he said that is something that he wanted to do. Doesn't the CIA have face technology to make a person look like anybody. And that thing where Biden put on a Trump hat didnt seem like something Biden would do, but something someone playing him would do to screw around for laughs.

How is it Bide went from continually falling down trying to walk up the Air Force One stairs, to suddenly being ale to sprint up them.

Finally, why is it this guy isn't seen in public. You would think people would record him on their phones. Heck if i saw in person i'd film him just to show it on here. It reminds me of RBG how they kept her alive even they it seemed she had been dead for a while.
